channel.title: Client Compiler Issue
channel.description: When I compile My client I get this [sup][sub]:: Preparing for compile... :: Auto-setting envriomental variables... :: :: Scanning for latest JDK version... :: :: Found JDK 1.6.0_06 :: Results: javac: file not found: *.java Usage: javac <options> <source files> use -help for a list of possible options :: Done! Press any key to continue . . .[/sub][/sup]

item.title: Client Compiler Issue
item.dc:creator: @Aftermath_961 Aftermath
item.description:
@Aftermath_961 wrote:

You don’t have any .java files where the compiler’s looking for them. Try putting them in the same directory as the .bat.

Read full topic

item.title: Client Compiler Issue
item.dc:creator: @gabe123654 gabe123654
item.description:
@gabe123654 wrote:

When I compile My client I get this
[sup][sub]:: Preparing for compile…
:: Auto-setting envriomental variables…
::
:: Scanning for latest JDK version…
::
:: Found JDK 1.6.0_06
:: Results:
javac: file not found: *.java
Usage: javac
use -help for a list of possible options
:: Done!
Press any key to continue . . .[/sub][/sup]
